    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        the main method of the thread class. Initializes the part of the population that is this thread's responsibility, and runs for a number of generations the DE algorithm, and handles migrations among populations living in different DDE processes (in different JVMs).
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • min

        private PairObjDouble min(FunctionIntf f,

                          VectorIntf[] copySols,
                          double[] copyVals,
                          Barrier b)
                   throws OptimizerException
        implements the DE algorithm on the part of the population managed by this thread.

      • bound

        private double bound(double val,
                     int j,
                     java.util.HashMap params)
              throws OptimizerException
        projects the value val of the j-th variable according to any box constraints described in the params passed in.
        Parameters:
        val - double
        j - int
        params - HashMap
        Returns:
        double
        Throws:
        OptimizerException

      • doMigration

        private void doMigration(int gen,
                         VectorIntf[] copysols,
                         double[] copyvals)
        implements a migration model based on the island migration topology specified by the next-process-id's in the parameters passed in. NOTICE there is a very significant constraint that cannot be enforced but is assumed to hold for the given process, namely that the number of individuals the first thread (_threads[0]) manages, is at least as large as the value _master._numMigrants, and that the same number of migrants is used for each participating process in the distributed DE run.
        Parameters:
        gen - int
        copysols - VectorIntf[]
        copyvals - double[]
